name: Take Something Literally 2 (Flash Game Desktop Version)
name_original: Take Something Literally 2 (Flash Game Desktop Version)
description:
Take Something Literally 2 is a compilation of 25 original puzzles.

Release in 2011 (25M plays since 2011)

NOTE : Download and play without the Flash plugin.

 In this game you just have to think outside the box. This game is abstract, conceptual and uses new interactivities. This new episode contains new features: new scoring system, new tip system and more funny rewards.
